author: timbeiko
content:
**Last ACD of 2024 tomorrow 14:00 UTC!**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1209
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/XtdJ2G8yST4

Ideally, we get to a final spec target for Pectra by the end of the call so that we can kick off the new year with a clear target ðŸ˜„

Small programming note: I'll have to head out 60m into the call, so <@539495253418180618> will close things off!

author: timbeiko
content:
A bunch of the Pectra EIPs had `FORK_TIMESTAMP` constants in them. Given that we now have Meta EIPs for forks and that Core EIPs get activated on several networks (at the very least, testnets + mainnet), it seems more appropriate to only track that info in Meta EIPs. 

I opened PRs updating all the ones I could find for `SFI`'d EIPs, authors, check your Github notifications!
